author: freek7899

author: jgm
content:
No, the message will require a BLS12-381 signature which is quite specific to the Ethereum consensus layer.

(In theory the ledger _could_ sign the credentials change message, there is some support in it for BLS12-381, but I don't believe that there is a general-purpose signing interface so they would have to build their own signing app to do so or open up an API for others to do so, and there has been no sign of that so far.)
